email_text: We invite you to the next step of our hiring process. Please schedule an interview using the link below.
Unfortunately after careful consideration we will not be moving forward with your application.
We would like to invite you to participate in our customer satisfaction survey and share your feedback
We appreciate your interest in the role but unfortunately we will not be continuing with your candidacy
We confirm receipt of your application for the junior developer position our team will review all submissions and contact selected candidates
Your application has been reviewed and we regret to inform you that you will not be moving to the next stage
Congratulations you have been selected to move forward to the next step of the hiring process please schedule an interview at your earliest convenience
We are pleased to inform you that you have advanced to the next round of our selection process please confirm your availability for an interview
Our team was impressed by your application and we would like to invite you to a phone screening
You have been shortlisted for the position and we would like to invite you for an interview
We are pleased to invite you to the next stage of recruitment please schedule an interview using the provided link
Thank you for your interest in the marketing assistant role unfortunately we have decided to move forward with other candidates
After reviewing your application for the software developer position we regret to inform you that you were not selected
Congratulations you have been shortlisted for the software engineer position please join us for an online technical interview next week
Join us for our upcoming webinar about personal finance tips and strategies. Click the link below to book your spot
We appreciate your time and effort in applying but your profile does not meet our current requirements
We are happy to inform you that you have advanced to the final interview round details will follow shortly
Following our recent review process we have chosen another candidate whose qualifications more closely match the role
Your application has been carefully considered but we will not be progressing with it at this time
Your account password was successfully changed if this was not you please contact support immediately
Thank you for applying for this job offer. We will contact you after reviewing your resume.
We noticed unusual activity on your bank account please verify your recent transactions
You have a new message from your internet service provider please log in to view it
We inform that the recruitment timeline for the graphic designer position has been extended you will receive an update once the selection phase resumes
Your application for the support specialist role is under consideration please be patient while our team reviews all candidates
After evaluating your profile we have chosen to pursue other candidates and will not be offering you the position
Your online order has been received and will be processed within two business days
Good morning check our extraordinary discounts on new TVs. Click the link below:
Your application for the data analyst role has been successfully received please note that due to a high number of applicants response times may vary
Hi friend we are going to cinema tommorow evening. Will you go with us?
Reminder your gym membership renewal is due next week. You can extend it by calling our customer service or on our website
Thank you for submitting your resume for the marketing assistant role we appreciate your interest in joining our company and will be in touch if shortlisted
We inform you that the recruitment process for the marketing position is taking longer than expected we will update you when we have news
This is to confirm that your application for the internship program has been received and is under consideration
Your package has been shipped and should arrive within three business days. Use the link below to track your order
Due to a high number of applicants the selection process for the design role is delayed but we will contact you if you are shortlisted

Thank you for applying to our company but after careful review we have decided not to move forward with your application at this time
